title: Walmart | SDE 3 | Bengaluru | Offer
content:
College: Tier 3
Education: B.E in Computer Science
Years of Experience: 4 years
Current Organization: SDE 2 at Adtech Company
Current Compensation: 18 LPA CTC ( 16.2 fixed including PF + 1.8 variable )
Date of the Offer: 01 Oct , 2024
Company: Walmart
Title/Level: SDE 3
Location: Bengaluru
Salary: 20.5 LPA ( Base ) + 98k ( retrials/PF)
Signing Bonus: 1 Lakh
Stock bonus: 5.10 LPA
Variable/Performance pay : 4.10 LPA
Total comp (Salary + Variable + Stock): ~ 30.7 LPA
Benefits: Standard Walmart Benefits

**Verdict:** This seems to be a very lowball offer , don't have any other offers in hand so accepted the offer.

title: Amazon | SDE2 | Hyderabad
content:
Education: B.Tech Tier 3
Years of Experience: 3.5
Prior Experience: SDE at unicorn startup
Prev Comp - 32 L base + 10L Annual ESOPs = 44 LPA
Date of Offer: Oct 2024

Company: Amazon
Title/Level: Software Engineer - II (L5)
Location: Hyderabad, India
Base Salary: 40L
Signon Bonus: INR 20L first year. INR 15L second year.
Stock bonus: 250 Stock Units (5-15-40-40% Vesting)
Total comp first year (Base Salary + Signon + Stock) = 40L + 20L + 2L = 62L
Benefits: Standard Amazon benefits.
Other details: Didn't negotiated, HR gave close to what I asked for.

title: Oracle (Non-OCI) | SMTS | Bangalore
content:

Location: Bangalore

Relocation/Signing Bonus: NA
Stock bonus: 35,000 USD
Bonus: NA

Advice needed: Should I accept the offered comp, or should I negotiate more?

title: Tekion Corp | SDE - 2 | Bangalore
content:

Title/Level: Software Engineer 2
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 36,00,000
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 1 lakh + 1 lakh
Stock bonus: 6000 units (Current Price per unit is $9.37 as per my knowledge)
Bonus: NA
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~44 LPA (Considering ESOPS - Strike price that I know of since Tekion does buy backs)
salaryTotal: : ~44 Lpa (considering Esops - Strike Price That I Know Of Since Tekion Does Buy Backs)

title: Docusign P3 offer
content:
Education: B.Tech in Computer Science from Tier-3 college
Years of Experience: ~5Y
Current CTC : 31 LPA (26base + 5L)
Current Company: Morgan stanley

Company: Docusign
Title/Level: P3
Location: Bangalore
Fixed Salary: 41LPA
RSU: 80K USD over 4 years
Yearly Performance Bonus: 1,96,000 (5%)
Total comp per year gross (Salary + Yearly Bonus + Stock):~59 LPA

Benefits: (Standard Benefits)
2 days WFO

I am declining the offer as the reviews which I got from few folks- bad culture, docusign had few layoffs in tech team in feb'24. Let me know any feedback?
salaryTotal: Per Year Gross (salary + Yearly Bonus + Stock):~59 Lpa

title: Walmart Global Tech | SDE 3 (IN3) | Chennai
content:
Education: B.Tech in Computer Science from Tier-3 college
Years of Experience: ~3Y
Current CTC : 23 LPA (15base + 3L bonus + 5L)
Current Company: Tier-1 Fintech Company

Date of the Offer: Oct 2024
Company: Walmart Global Tech
Title/Level: SDE III
Location: Chennai
Fixed Salary: 18.5LPA
Signing Bonus: 2.5 Lakh
Stock bonus: ~4,65,000 (25% of base) over 3 year. (1,55,000 every year)
Yearly Performance Bonus: 3,70,000 (20% of base)
Total comp per year gross (Salary + Yearly Bonus + Stock):~23.75 LPA + 2.5L (one time joining bonus).

Benefits: (Standard Benefits)
5 days RTO

Negotiated, but not got any reply, wont jump for 75k hike from my current ctc.
salaryTotal: Per Year Gross (salary + Yearly Bonus + Stock):~23.75 Lpa + 2.5l (one Time Joining Bonus).

title: Moveinsync | SDE 1 | Bangalore
content:
